The subtitle belongs here

Dunedin City Motors are a leading Ford and Mazda vehicle dealership with an extensive range of new and used vehicles, including demonstrations and trade-ins. Based in Dunedin, Oamaru and Alexandra our experienced sales teams are available to discuss your vehicle requirements and finance options available, ensuring you receive a vehicle that suits your needs within your budget.

View more

A wide range of vehicles

As well as the full range of Ford and Mazda vehicles, we also stock an extensive range of trade-ins available from a wide variety of Japanese manufacturers including Subaru, Mitsubishi and Toyota, as well as a more prestige range including Mercedes Benz, Jeep, VW and more!

Finance options

There are a range of finance options available with fast approval and payment schedules to suit your budget. Let us help you navigate the application process to ensure you secure the vehicle of your choice at competitive finance rates with affordable payments.

Trusted by thousands

With a long history of Distinguished Achievement Awards for excellence in quality and customer satisfaction, we have the confidence that we will provide a smooth and professional experience when purchasing your vehicle with us.

Lifelong servicing

We are the authorised agents for Ford in Dunedin and Oamaru, and for Mazda in Dunedin and Otago. We use the latest in vehicle servicing and repair technology to ensure we get your car serviced quickly, with great ease and with the best possible care.
